attributes.action: halt the production H1N1(Swine Flu) vaccine for the whole UK.And the right to decline the vaccination for ourselves and our children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vaccination should be a choice that each individual makes for himself. Some people react adversely to these vaccinations and end up getting ill with the disease that the vaccination was supposed to prevent. It would be a human rights violation to force these upon everyone.
Some researchers argue that there are risks associated flu vaccines. Most vaccines are preserved not only with mercury but also with aluminium – heavy metals that scientists claim are harmful to nerves, glands, and brains – long-term. 
Vaccine critics argue that it is contradictory to state that Swine Flu is new, quite unlike any flu virus seen before, while at the same time promoting millions of vaccine vials that were possibly manufactured months or years prior to any given outbreak. If a new strand of virus is "new and different” then older vaccines will probably be useless. Numerous Internet articles expose the debate about vaccine effectiveness as is shown when searching for terms such as “vaccine risks.”
